author: craigmcc
msg: Make ActionForm actually Serializable by making the two non-Serializable

author: craigmcc
msg: Make the instance variables of ActionForm transient so that they can
actually be serialized (as implied by the fact that ActionForm implements
Serializable).  Note that if you ever deserialize such an ActionForm bean,
you will need to call setServlet() and possibly
setMultipartRequestHandler() to re-establish the appropriate connections.
